mixed-citation.article-title: One new genus and nineteen new species of ground spiders (Araneae: Gnaphosidae) from Iran, with other taxonomic considerations

tp:treatment-sec.p: The genus is currently known by 10 species, including two from the Nearctic. The Palearctic species S . loricatus (L. Koch, 1866) and seven species from India , are all known from females and probably misplaced in this genus ( WSC 2021 ).
